name: Asha Gupta
summary: Good command of language; minor inaccuracies in sentence structure.

questions.question: Tell me about yourself
questions.transcript: I am Asha, a computer science student with interest in web development.

questions.question: Describe a memorable trip
questions.transcript: I traveled to Rishikesh last year and enjoyed the river rafting experience.

name: Rahul Sharma
summary: Very strong speaking skills with accurate pronunciation and good vocabulary range.

questions.question: What are your hobbies?
questions.transcript: I love photography and coding, and I often combine both by building photography websites.

questions.question: Talk about your hometown
questions.transcript: I come from Jaipur, a city known for its palaces and cultural heritage.

name: Neha Verma
summary: Basic communication is good; focus on expanding vocabulary and reducing grammatical errors.

questions.question: Describe your daily routine
questions.transcript: I wake up early, do some exercise and then attend online classes.

questions.question: Describe a favorite food
questions.transcript: I like palak paneer; it is nutritious and tastes great with roti.
